title: Wisdom
description:
Dorma McGruder, Serena Eve Richardson, and D.W. Baldwin share stories about finding one's inner courage, a brother's struggle with alcohol, and a couple's spiritual journey.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Curtis T, The Soul Snatchers, Dorma McGruder, Aretha Franklin, Serena Eve Richardson, The Japanese House, Andy Shauf, Kevin Allison, D.W. Baldwin)
